alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:20PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties and Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Widespread winter driving conditions can be expected into Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties
